name: A & M Airsports, LTD
about: A&M Airsports, LTD, has been a premier provider of Light Sport and Ultralight Trike flight instruction and sales in the Chicago area and the greater Midwest since 1997. Specializing in the safe and enjoyable "Trike" style light sport aircraft, our certified flight instructors boast thousands of hours of flight experience, prioritizing safety above all. We offer introductory flights and comprehensive training programs, ensuring all aircraft are maintained to the highest industry standards. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pilot, A&M Airsports welcomes you to experience the thrill of flying with us. Come visit and take to the skies with confidence.
